channel.title: Comments on: Local Helper
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Shaan Nicol
item.dc:creator: Shaan Nicol
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/local-helper/#comment-552">Nick Davis</a>.
Thanks Nick.
It's essentially a form which the data is used to populate a post type called profile and then assign the user as the author of that post, they can then login and manage their information.
Once logged in, they can also post a job and send private messages between the community. Will be interesting to see how it goes.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nick Davis.

Thanks Nick.

It’s essentially a form which the data is used to populate a post type called profile and then assign the user as the author of that post, they can then login and manage their information.

Once logged in, they can also post a job and send private messages between the community. Will be interesting to see how it goes.

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/local-helper/#comment-551">Shaan Nicol</a>.
Nice :)
I'm a big fan of 'playing' with Gravity Forms and ACF and I can imagine a lot of work must've gone into this.
Looks really well put together.

item.title: By: Shaan Nicol
item.dc:creator: Shaan Nicol
item.description: After a fairly long development phase we've pushed this one out the door today. It's a custom Genesis site built on the Bones for Genesis starter theme and utilises some Gravity Forms and Advanced Custom Fields trickery.
item.content:encoded: After a fairly long development phase we’ve pushed this one out the door today. It’s a custom Genesis site built on the Bones for Genesis starter theme and utilises some Gravity Forms and Advanced Custom Fields trickery.
